I'll set up the cursor with these keywords. Then, using agent-run_agent, I'll instruct the agent to find the first occurrence. The maxEvidenceCount is set to 1 to get the first mention. If the cursor returns the relevant paragraph, I'll check the pointerLabel and include it in the answer.
